channel.title: John Baird
channel.description: Recent news about John Baird, from openparliament.ca.

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Also great to see my friend and colleague, German FM Guido Westerwelle. http://t.co/DIEokSo1X8

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: This morning I attended a meeting hosted by @David_Cameron on the dire humanitarian situation in Syria. http://t.co/bvTu2WLHNS

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Had a good discussion today with Russian FM Sergei Lavrov on the situation in Syria. @MFA_Russia http://t.co/EsREW4NIGx

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Great to meet with my friend and colleague, Australian Foreign Minister @bobjcarr, while in Russia. http://t.co/SCWTLCxkFq

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: John Kerry had another good day today.

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: 2/ Greg will continue to build on our government's exceptional investments in jobs, growth and long-term prosperity in Northern Ontario.

item.title: Mentioned by Herald
item.description:
The Soapbox: REAL Women, false generalizations - Moose Jaw Times
Conservative MP and Foreign Affairs Minister John Baird has come under fire for his stance on homosexual rights. Times-Herald photo by Samuel Dobrin. Justin Crann: Published on August 10, 2013: Published on August 10, 2013; Justin Crann · RSS Feed.

item.title: Mentioned by Winnipeg Sun
item.description:
Letters: August 12, 2013
I just wanted to thank NDP MP Yvon Godin for bringing this issue to light. About a year ago I was handed a business card by John Baird. When I realized that the card was English only, my first reaction was to call Mr. Baird's office and complain. Unfortunately ...

item.title: Mentioned by Globe and Mail
item.description:
Baird under fire from conservative women's group for defending gay rights
A right-wing women's group is attacking Foreign Affairs Minister John Baird for defending the civil rights of gays abroad, suggesting the Tory MP is out of step with “conservative values” and the grassroots within his own party. REAL Women of Canada, ...

item.title: Mentioned by Standard Freeholder
item.description:
John Baird's English-only business cards breach guidelines: Report
OTTAWA - NDP MP Yvon Godin says Canada's official languages czar should consider taking Foreign Affairs Minister John Baird to court over his English-only business cards. Baird ordered the cards shortly after being named to his current portfolio in 2011.

item.title: Mentioned by London Free Press
item.description:
